response.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<!--
  THIS FILE NEEDS TO BE EMBEDDED INTO `RequirementsFileXml.json` IN ORDER TO BE RECOGNIZED BY THE TESTS.
  IT WILL **NOT** BE SOURCED ON ITS OWN
  IT IS ONLY STORED HERE FOR EDITING AND READABILITY PURPOSES

  USE THE FOLLOWING COMMAND TO CREATE THE NEEDED STRING:
  cat RequirementsXmlFile.xml|sed -e 's@"@\"@g'|sed -e ':a' -e 'N' -e '$!ba' -e 's@
@\n@g'
-->
<requirements xmlns="http://weblabel.hella-aglaia.com/schema/requirements">
  <thing id="thing-one" shape="rectangle" name="Traffic Sign">
    <class id="sign-type" name="Sign type">
      <value id="u-turn" name="U-Turn" />
      <value id="speed-sign" name="Speed sign" />
    </class>
  </thing>
</requirements>
